Title: The Dread Citadel - Naxxramas
Description:
Long ago, magical wards placed upon Naxxramas stymied our attempts to assault Kel'Thuzad's forces. Though I was able to conceal our army past them, I have since learned to dispel them should the need ever arise.

I will confess my disbelief of your story. However, if you are so devoted to this investigation, I will enchant your insignia so  you may breach these barriers yourself.
ObjectivesText: Archmage Angela Dosantos in the Eastern Plaguelands will empower your Argent Dawn Commission at no cost. You must be Exalted with the Argent Dawn.
